page.description: Populates the choices in a Dropdownbox control.

argument.name: controlName
argument.description: Name of the control (must be uppercase)

argument.name: data
argument.description: A Javascript array of the choices

argument.name: clearExistingData
argument.description: True or false. Existing choices are cleared out if true

section.title: Example
section.description: Populate the choices in the Dropdown Box for the 'COMPANY' field. Add the new choices to the existing choices.
Populate the choices in the Dropdown Box for the 'COMPANY' field. Replace the existing choices. Each new choice that is added has both a display and stored value.
